product_summary: Roamify is a free AI-powered travel itinerary planner. It helps you create personalized itineraries based on your preferences, budget, and time constraints.
product_pros: Helps you save time and money
product_cons: May not be suitable for complex itineraries
Can be biased towards certain destinations
May not always find the best deals

product_usecases.use_case: Planning a trip to a new destination
product_usecases.details: Roamify can help you research destinations, find attractions, and create an itinerary that fits your interests and budget.

product_usecases.use_case: Finding the best deals on flights and accommodation
product_usecases.details: Roamify can help you compare prices from different airlines and hotels to find the best deals.
Roamify can help you create an itinerary that takes into account your preferences, budget, and time constraints.
Roamify can provide you with inspiration for your travels by suggesting destinations and activities that you may not have considered.

product_usecases.use_case: Planning a trip with friends or family
product_usecases.details: Roamify can help you collaborate with friends or family to create an itinerary that everyone will enjoy.

product_toolfor.details: Roamify is a great tool for travelers of all levels, from beginners to experienced travelers.
Roamify can help budget travelers find the best deals on flights and accommodation.
Roamify can help families plan trips that everyone will enjoy.
Roamify can help solo travelers create personalized itineraries that fit their interests and budget.
Roamify can help travel agents create personalized itineraries for their clients.
